item.description:
Meet first for "Moonrise Kingdom" at Amherst Cinema, then have dinner at Fresh Side.

The movie is scheduled for 5:10, try to be there 20 minutes before then to meet the group. We should be getting to "Fresh Side" by 7:00.

The description from the Amherst Cinema website does not make the movie sound that interesting;

http://amherstcinema.org/films-and-events/moonrise-kingdom

However the preview (seen before Bernie) indicates there is more going on. It should be interesting.

Manohla Dargis reviewed it last month for the NYT;

http://movies.nytimes.com/2012/05/25/movies/wes-andersons-moonrise-kingdom-with-bruce-willis.html?pagewanted=all

She liked it.

I've been to Fresh Side twice, liked it both times.
item.name: Moonrise Kingdom, @4:45 then "Fresh Side" @7
